outline:
Old Tantra sgang steng plain Bruno Lainé
remplace ' et ' å = A ¥ = I Ë = U ◊ = M ee = ai dzny = dz+ny ngh = ng+h ˆ = N ∂ = D † = T ndh = n+d+h ndr = n+d+r ntr = n+t+r dh = d+h ry = r+y dm = d+m hy = h+y rdzogs sho = rdzogs s+ho kt = k+t
103 Ggi001.001 MWxxxka1Ixxx1
1b-91b chos thams cad rdzogs pa chen po byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po
965 Ggi001.002 MWxxxka1Ixxx1
91b-94b kun byed rgyal po'i skabs sbyor
kun byed rgyal po'i skabs sbyor lnga bcu rtsa bdun bshad pa rdzogs so
966 Ggi001.003 MWxxxka1Ixxx1
94b-107a kun byed rgyal po'i rgyud phyi ma
rgyud phyi ma zhes bya ba mdo lung bcu gnyis pa rdzogs so
967 Ggi001.004 MWxxxka1Ixxx1
107a-124b kun byed rgyal po'i rgyud phyi ma'i phyi ma
byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po/ lta ba nam mkha' ltar mtha' dbus med pa'i rgyud/ nam mkha' snying po mchog gi don/ gsang ba mchog gi mdo lung brgyad cu rtsa bzhi pa rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal gyi seng ge dang/ dge slong bai ro tsa nas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o
398 Ggi001.005 MWxxxka1Ixxx1
124b-137b la zlo gsang ba'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i rgyud

137b-169a shes bya mtha' gcod kyi rgyud
byang chub kyi sems shes bya mtha' gcod kyi rgyud ces bya ba rdzogs so
104 Ggi001.007 MWxxxka1Ixxx1
169a-178b byang chub kyi sems su 'dus pa'i mdo
byang chub kyi sems kyi mdo dang 'grel pa rdzogs so
968 Ggi001.008 MWxxxka1Ixxx1
178b-182a rnam par bgrang ba'i mdo dang 'grel pa
969 Ggi001.009 MWxxxka1Ixxx1
182a-186a phun sum tshogs pa'i mdo dang 'grel pa ces phun sum tshogs pa'i mdo dang 'grel pa rdzogs so
970 Ggi001.010 MWxxxka1Ixxx1
186a-188b bye brag 'byed pa'i mdo dang 'grel pa
971 Ggi001.011 MWxxxka1Ixxx1
188b-193a khyad par 'phags pa'i mdo dang 'grel pa
ces khyad par 'phags pa'i mdo las/ don gyi 'grel pa bstan pa ste/ khyad par 'phags pa'i mdo rdzogs so// lnga pa'o
972 Ggi001.012 MWxxxka1Ixxx1
193a-202b gol sgrib ston pa'i mdo dang 'grel pa
ces gol sgrib bstan pa'i mdo rdzogs so// drug pa'o
973 Ggi001.013 MWxxxka1Ixxx1
202b-216a gtan la dbab pa'i mdo dang 'grel pa
974 Ggi001.014 MWxxxka1Ixxx1
216a-226a nges par ston pa'i mdo dang 'grel pa
nges par ston pa'i mdo las/ man ngag brgyad pa dang don gyi 'grel pa bstan pa rdzogs so// //brgyad pa'o
975 Ggi001.015 MWxxxka1Ixxx1
226a-230a theg pa yas phubs theg pa dgu'i mdo
976 Ggi001.016 MWxxxka1Ixxx1
230a-239b yongs su rdzogs pa'i mdo dang 'grel pa
977 Ggi001.017 MWxxxka1Ixxx1
239b-241b don gyi 'grel pa lnga po
yongs su gcod pa'i mdo dang don gyi 'grel pa lnga pa'o// //rdzogs so
978 Ggi001.018 MWxxxka1Ixxx1
241b-242b bstan pa yongs su gtad pa
don gyi 'grel pa lnga po 'dis/ /ma bshad skyon yang lnga yod de// theg pa kun gyi 'grel pa 'bum sder bzhugs pa las/ byang chub sems kyi mdo 'grel chen po bcu dang/ don gyi 'grel pa lnga bstan pa rdzogs so
132 Ggi001.019 MWxxxka1Ixxx1
242b-254a bkra shis pa'i dpal
bkra shis pa'i rgyud rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI sing+ha dang/ bod kyi lo tsa ba bee ro tsa nas bsgyur ba'o
110 Ggi001.020 MWxxxka1Ixxx1
254a-259b rtsal chen gyi rgyud
byang chub kyi sems thig pa ltar spyod/ dam tshig ting nge 'dzin rtsal sprugs pa'i rtsal chen rdzogs so// //mtshan la rgya gar gyi skad smos pa bod du bsgyur ba/ byang chub kyi sems rtsal chen gyi rgyud ces bya ste spyir zhabs su bsgyur ro/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI sing+ha dang/ bod kyi lo tsa ba chen po bee ro tsa nas bsgyur ba'o
111 Ggi001.021 MWxxxka1Ixxx1
259b-270a khyung chen gyi rgyud
rgyas pa chen po sha bu rgyas pa'i sgo bkag ste/ rgyas pa bag yangs bde bar gzhag pa'i khyung chen gyi rgyud rgyas pa chen po'i mtha' rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI sing+ha dang/ bod kyi lo tsa ba bee ro tsa nas bsgyur ba'o
114 Ggi001.022 MWxxxka1Ixxx1
270a-274b byang chub sems bsgom pa
sems bsgom rdo la gser zhun rdzogs so
102 Ggi001.023 MWxxxka1Ixxx1
274b-282a byang chub sems rdo rje 'od 'phro ba'i rgyud kyi rim pa zhes bya ba
rgyud kyi rgyal po mi nub rgyal mtshan rje btsan dam pa rdo rje 'od 'phro ba'i rgyud rdzogs so
112 Ggi001.024 MWxxxka1Ixxx1
282a-284b rdo rje sems dpa' nam mkha' che rgyas pa'i yi ge med pa'i rgyud
bod kyi dge slong bee ro tsa na dang/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po dznyA na gar bhas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

284b-285a rje btsan dam pa
lung dang man nag gi don yi ge nyung yang don rgya chen bsdus te/ ma lus 'grel cing theg pa mtha' dag gi don bkod pa/ byang chub kyi sems bsam gtan nges pa'i rgyal po/ rje btsan dam pa rdzogs so
415 Ggi001.026 MWxxxka1Ixxx1
285a-287a mi 'gyur ba'i thig le tig
byang chub kyi sems mi 'gyur ba'i thig le tig rdzogs so

287a-288b srog gi 'khor lo
srog gi 'khor lo rdzogs so

288b-290b nam mkha'i rgyal po
byang chub sems nam mkha'i rgyal po rdzogs so
957 Ggi001.029 MWxxxka1Ixxx1
290b-296a rtse mo byung rgyal
byang chub sems rtse mo byung rgyal zhes bya ba bsam gtan rdzogs so
417 Ggi001.030 MWxxxka1Ixxx1
296a-297b bde 'jam
klong gi dkyil 'khor chen po bde 'jam rdzogs so

297b-298b bde ba phra bkod
byang chub sems bde ba phra bkod rdzogs so

298b-299b kun 'dus
byang chub kyi sems kun 'dus rdzogs so

299b-300b byang chub kyi sems gnam spar 'debs
byang chub sems mi 'gyur ba'i rdo rje thug rje chen po'i 'od/ gnam spar 'debs rdzogs so
959 Ggi001.034 MWxxxka1Ixxx1
300b-303b byang chub kyi sems bde ba chen po gsal bar byed pa'i myu gu
byang chub kyi sems bde ba chen po'i myu gu rdzogs so
420 Ggi001.035 MWxxxka1Ixxx1
303b-304a rdzogs pa spyi gcod
rdzogs pa spyi gcod ces bya ba rdzogs so
421 Ggi001.036 MWxxxka1Ixxx1
304a-304b khams gsum sgron ma
byang chub kyi sems khams gsum sgron ma rdzogs so
135 Ggi001.037 MWxxxka1Ixxx1
304b-315b byang chub sems bsgom pa'i rgyud
byang chub kyi sems sgom pa'i rgyud las/ theg pa'i snying po rdzogs so
105 Ggi001.038 MWxxxka1Ixxx1
315b-322a chos thams cad byang chub kyi sems rdzogs pa chen po 'khor ba rtsad nas gcod pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i yi ge med pa'i rgyud
chos thams cad nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa yi ge med pa'i rgyud/ bcom ldan 'das kun rig rgyal pos gsung pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI singha dang/ bod kyi lo tsa ba bee ro tsa nas bsgyur ba'o
106 Ggi001.039 MWxxxka1Ixxx1
322b-331b chos thams cad byang chub kyi sems rdzogs pa chen po 'khor ba rtsad nas gcod pa rgya mtsho dang mnyam pa rnyog ma med pa'i rgyud
chos thams cad rgya mtsho mtha' dang mnyam pa rnyog ma med pa'i rgyud las/ bcom ldan 'das kun rig rgyal pos gsung pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI singha dang/ bod kyi lo tsa ba bee ro tsa nas bsgyur ba'o
107 Ggi001.040 MWxxxka1Ixxx1
331b-338b chos thams cad byang chub kyi sems rdzogs pa chen po 'khor ba rtsad nas gcod pa nyi zla dang mnyam pa dri ma med pa'i rgyud
chos thams cad rig pa nyi zla mtha' dang mnyam pa dri ma med pa'i rgyud/ bcom ldan 'das kun rig rgyal pos gsungs pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI singha dang/ bod kyi lo tsa ba bee ro tsa nas bsgyur ba'o
109 Ggi001.041 MWxxxka1Ixxx1
338b-346b chos thams cad byang chub kyi sems rdzogs pa chen po 'khor ba rtsad nas gcod pa rin po che dang mnyam pa skye ba med pa'i rgyud
chos thams cad rin po che dang mnyam pa skye ba med pa'i rgyud/ bcom ldan 'das kun rig rgyal pos gsungs pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI singha dang/ bod kyi lo tsa ba bee ro tsa nas bsgyur ba'o// //snga 'gyur lnga dang phyir 'gyur bcu gsum gyi rgyud la gnyi ba'i ban chub nyi ma rdo rjes byas pa
423 Ggi001.042 MWxxxka1Ixxx1
346b-372b ye shes gsang ba'i rgyud
ye shes gsang ba'i rgyud chen po/ theg pa yang rtse'i don dgos don man ngag tu phyug ba shin tu gang/ mi spel lo/ /rdzogs so// //sandhi mahA dz+nyag+h+yahayanamatan+t+ra/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI singha dang/ bod kyi lo tsha ba pa gor bee ro tsa nas/ yul dha ho na'i 'du khang du bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o
100 Ggi001.043 MWxxxka1Ixxx1
372b-384b ye shes rdzogs pa'i rgyud
rin chen 'khor lo ye shes rdzogs pa'i rgyud don man ngag tu bya ba mthar thug pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI singha dang/ bod kyi lo tsa ba bee ro tsa nas dha he na'i 'du khang du bsgyur ba'o
980 Ggi001.044 MWxxxka1Ixxx1
384b-396b ye shes gsang ba sgron ma'i rgyud
ye shes gsang ba sgron ma rin po che'i rgyud ces bya ba rdzogs so// //paˆ∂ita shrI singha dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba bee ro tsa nas man ngag gi rgyud gtan la phab pa'o
95 Ggi001.045 MWxxxka1Ixxx1
396b-409a rin po che 'phags lam bkod pa'i rgyud
rin po che 'phags lam bkod pa'i rgyud ces bya ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi paˆ∂ita shrI singha dang/ bod kyi lo tsa ba chen po bee ro tsa nas bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o// /'di khams lugs kyi rgyud gsang ba sgron ma'i gzhug la bris shig
96 Ggi002.001 MWxxxkha2Ixxx1
1b-128a rdo rje sems dpa' nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud chen po
'das pa dang/ ma byon pa dang/ da ltar phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa chos thams cad nam mkha'i ngo bo/ nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam par sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud chen po rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI shingha dang/ dge slong bee ro tsa nas bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o// //zhung tshad bam po bcu gcig pa'o
1019 Ggi002.002 MWxxxkha2Ixxx1
128a-192b rdo rje sems dpa' nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud chen po
rgyud kyi rgyal po rdo rje sems dpa' nam mkha' mtha' dang mnyam par sbyor ba zhes bya ba/ byang chub kyi sems rdzogs pa chen po'i rgyud rdzogs so/ /kha sa mAnta chen po rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI singha dang/ bod kyi dge slong bee ro tsa nas dha he na'i 'du khang du bsgyur ro
134 Ggi002.003 MWxxxkha2Ixxx1
192b-204b rdo rje sems dpa' nam mkha' che gsang ba'i snying po rnal ma don gyi rgyud
rdo rje sems dpa' nam mkha' che snying po rnal ma don gyi rgyud rdzogs so
981 Ggi002.004 MWxxxkha2Ixxx1
204b-243b rdo rje sems dpa' nam mkha' che kun tu bzang po gsang ba snying po'i rgyud
rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI singha dang/ bod kyi lo tsa ba bee ro tsa nas bsgyur ba'o
962 Ggi002.005 MWxxxkha2Ixxx1
243b-257a rdo je sems dpa' nam mkha' che bram ze rgyas pa'i rgyud
bram ze rgyas pa rdzogs so
112 Ggi002.006 MWxxxkha2Ixxx1
257a-273a rdo rje sems dpa' nam mkha' che rgyas pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor pa'i rgyud
123 Ggi002.007 MWxxxkha2Ixxx1
273a-295b rdo rje sems dpa' nam mkha' che rgyas pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin nam mkha' che rgyas pa zhes bya ba ste/ man ngag gi snying po zhes bya ba rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud/ rdzogs pa'i yang rdzogs pa/ zab mo'i yang zab mo/ shin tu rnal 'byor gyi don mthar thug pa nam mkha' che'i rgyud rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dznyA na garbha dang/ bod kyi dge slong bee ro tsa nas bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa/ phyis skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos pa'o
422 Ggi002.008 MWxxxkha2Ixxx1
295b-299b byang chub sems bsgom pa yi ge med pa'i rgyud
byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa yi ge med pa'i rgyud ces bya ba/ man ngag gi snying po don dam pa'i don dam pa las/ thams cad yi ge med par gyur ba'i skabs shin tu brtag dka' ba'i don rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI shingha dang/ dznyA na gar+b+ha zer ba 'dug/ bod kyi lo tsa ba dge slong bee ro tsa nas bsgyur ba'o
131 Ggi002.009 MWxxxkha2Ixxx1
299b-316a byang chub kyi sems rmad du byung ba'i rgyud
rgyud kyi rgyal po chos thams cad kyi rmad du byung ba rdzogs so// //byang chub kyi sems rmad du byung ba phyi ma ta ma nyid dang gsum bzhugs pa las/ zab mo pu ti'i lha khang du bu gnyis lus so/ slob dpon buddha kuptas snums par gzheng nas/ lan gcig gzigs pas/ gnod sbyin kha rtsal gyi 'gram du thal lcag gcig brgyab nas brgyal bar gyur to/ brgyal sangs pa dang/ srin po lta bu'i tshul du 'dug pas smras pa/ gnas khang brgyal bar gyur pa 'di nyid kyi/ rgyal po me 'od khyod kyi me khyer ro/ gal te khyer na khyod nyid gsad par bya/ zhes smras pas/ bred nas sdangs nas/ ma ni gong du spyan gzhan zhig tu drangs/ bu gnyis der lus so/ gang du de nyid rnam par 'grel ba las/ dgos don gsal tshad don la 'char ba ni/ ma bu gsum nas drangs gtan la phab/ phyi nas blo'i zer la bskyod nas bya bzod na/ 'phags thugs 'gal dang 'phral du gnod sbyin mos/ bar chad byed phyir blo'i gzer la bskyod/ las stod mkhas pa mgon po la/ /myang stod lce nag bdud rtsis zhus
402 Ggi002.010 MWxxxkha2Ixxx1
316a-352a bde ba chen po byang chub kyi sems rmad du byung ba'i le'u
rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI singha dang/ bod kyi lo tsa ba bee ro tsa nas bsgyur ba'o
130 Ggi002.011 MWxxxkha2Ixxx1
352a-383b byang chub kyi sems rmad du byung ba/ byang chub sems rmad du byung ba'i le'u
rmad du byung ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi ma la mi tra dang/ lo tsa ba gnyags dznyA na ku (ma) ras bsgyur nas gtan la phab pa'o// shrI singha dang/ bee ro tsa nas sngar yang bsgyur
98 Ggi002.012 MWxxxkha2Ixxx1
383b-390a rin po che 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i rgyud
rin po che 'khor lo'i rgyud rdzogs so
30 Ggi002.013 MWxxxkha2Ixxx1
390a-391a ye shes 'khor lo'i rgyud
423 Ggi003.001 MWxxxga3Ixxx1
1b-17a rdzogs pa chen po ye shes gsang ba'i rgyud
rgya gar dga' rab rdo rjes/ bram ze bde mchog la/ bde ldan gyi yang thog tu rin po che gser gyi glegs bam la bee dËrya zhun mas bris pa'i bla dpe gnang ste/ gdung rabs lngar bla dpe las mi bzhugs so/ /rdzogs pa chen po ye shes gsang ba'i rgyud rdzogs so// //bu la gtad do pha yi btsas/ snod med rnam la shor ra re/ /rdzogs pa chen po klong dgu bam po 'bum sde las 'di las zab ma mi bzhugs so/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gros srungs shig/ /sa ma ya/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po sha ri sing ha pra ba ta dang/ bod kyi lo tsa ba A tsa rya bee ro tsa nas bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o
424 Ggi003.002 MWxxxga3Ixxx1
17a-37a byang chub kyi sems rdzogs pa chen po ye shes gsang ba bshad pa'i rgyud gsal ba mtha' dang mnyams pa

425 Ggi003.003 MWxxxga3Ixxx1
37a-52b rdo rje sems dpa' nam mkha' che rtsa ba'i rgyud skye ba med pa
lung rtsa ba'i rgyud rje'u'i don du bstan pa yin/ /rdzogs so
426 Ggi003.004 MWxxxga3Ixxx1
52b-73a rdo rje sems dpa' nam mkha' che rgyal po rgyas pa'i rgyud
rgyal po rgyas rgyud snying por gyur pa'o// rdzogs so
427 Ggi003.005 MWxxxga3Ixxx1
73a-84b rdo rje sems dpa' nam mkha' che'i rgyud
rdo rje sems dpa' nam mkha' che'i rgyud rdzogs so
428 Ggi003.006 MWxxxga3Ixxx1
84b-157a byang chub kyi sems rdzogs pa chen po mkha' mnyam klong gi rgyud kyi rgyal po
byang chub kyi sems rdzogs pa chen po/ rdo rje sems dpa mkha' mnyam klong gi rgyud ces bya ba rdzogs so// //'da' he na yi 'du khang du/ /sprul pa'i sku shrI sing ha dang/ /dge slong bee ro tsa na yis/ /rgyud 'di legs par bsgyur byas pas/ /mtha' yas sems can thams cad kun/ /rang grol bde ba thob par shog/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po mkha' mnyam klong gi rgyud 'di/ rgyud kyi man ngag yin te/ kun la med pas gsang bar bya'o/ /sa brgyad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' las 'phro skal bar ldan la gnas so/ /i ti
429 Ggi003.007 MWxxxga3Ixxx1
157a-159a ye shes mdzod chen chos kyi dbyings
ye shes mdzod chen chos kyi dbyings/ /rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa'o/ /rdzogs so
430 Ggi003.008 MWxxxga3Ixxx1
159a-161a ye shes gsal ba chos kyi dbyings
ye shes gsal ba chos kyi dbyings/ /rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa'o// rdzogs so

161a-162a ye shes 'bar ba chos kyi dbyings
ye shes 'bar ba chos kyi dbyings/ /rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa'o/ /rdzogs so
432 Ggi003.010 MWxxxga3Ixxx1
162a-164a ye shes sa gcig chos kyi dbyings
ye shes sa gcig chos kyi dbyings/ /rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa'o// rdzogs so

164a-184b byang chub kyi sems kyi rgya mtsho klong dgu'i rgyud
slob dpon chen po shrI sing ha dang/ dge slong bee ro tsa nas bsgyur ba'o/ /rdzogs pa chen po rin chen klong dgu'i rgyud gsang ba rdzogs so// //rgyud 'di'i snod mdo byang bdun par ltos shig
434 Ggi003.012 MWxxxga3Ixxx1
184b-195a byang chub kyi sems kun 'dus 'od kyi rgyud
byang chub kyi sems kun 'dus 'od kyi tan tra rdzogs so

195a-210b ye shes rin chen 'od kyi rgyud
rin po che 'od kyi rgyud ces bya ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI sing ha dang/ lo tsa ba bee ro tsa nas dha he na'i 'du khang du bsgyur ba'o
436 Ggi003.014 MWxxxga3Ixxx1
210b-234b byang chub sems nya mo 'khor lo'i rgyud
byang chub kyi sems rdzogs pa chen po kun 'dus gser gyi nya mo 'khor lo bskor ba'i rgyud chen po rdzogs so// //dgon phug gi bka' rgyud 'di rnam kyang bstan pa'i yang snying gyi yang snying yin pas/ spel na mkha' 'gro shrI dza mun tas mngon sum du snying 'byin no
437 Ggi003.015 MWxxxga3Ixxx1
235a-254b yi ge 'bru bshad las kyi 'khor lo

254b-257a byang chub kyi sems thig pa nya mo bag la nyal
byang chub kyi sems thig pa nya mo bag la nyal rdzogs so// /rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI sing ha dang/ bod kyi lo tsa ba bee ro tsa nas bsgyur ba'o
439 Ggi003.017 MWxxxga3Ixxx1
257a-262a rig pa nam mkha' ltar gsal ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud
rig pa nam mkha' ltar gsal ba'i rgyud rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi paˆ∂i ta shrI singha dang/ bod kyi lo tsa ba dge slong bee ro tsa nas bsgyur zhing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o/ /ye shes gsang ba'i rgyud ces bya'o
440 Ggi003.018 MWxxxga3Ixxx1
262a-285b thams cad nam mkha'i ngo bo skye ba med pa'i byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa'i rgyud
gsang/ gsang ba'i rgyud sa pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rigs can/ dad pa dang spur ldan pa la sbyin pa las/ gzhan du ma gsungs so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i rigs la sbyin no/ /'di 'dod dus su rgyud gnyis sbyin mi bya/ /'di ster ba yi mtshan ldan skyes bu la/ /nang rgyud 'ga' zung rmad 'byung rgyas pa dang/ /byang chub sems sgoms gshin rje gnam rgyud rnams/ /skyes chen rnams kyi thob skal yin pas sbyin/ /mi 'gal tshul du sbyin lugs man ngag bstan/ /slob dpon slob bus 'di gzhung ma snyegs na/ /'bras bu mi thob myal rgyu sogs pa mang/ /'di gzhung snyegs na 'di gzhung kho nas 'grub/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal rdzun med nyid kyi gsungs/ /dus med rtag tu byang chub sems dang spyad/ /rdzogs so
441 Ggi003.019 MWxxxga3Ixxx1
285b-289a byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa'i rgyud

'bras bu gsang ba bla na med pa'i rgyud chen po dri ma med pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so// //o rgyan gyi mkhan po padma 'byung gnas kyi zhal snga dang/ lo tsha ba dge slong bee ro tsa nas dpal bsam yas kyi gtsug lag khang chen por bsgyur ba'o/ /phyis mnga' bdag sras dbon gsum gyis/ o rgyan la zhus te/ dag par gtan la phab nas/ dkar chag la phab ste/ las 'phro can dang phrad par shog gi smon lam btab nas/ nam mkha'i rdzong du a tha◊ rgya/ xxx /e ma bdag 'dra padma 'byung gnas kyis/ /gsang sngags mthar thug rgyud mchog 'di/ /rtsod ldan dus kyi lnga brgya la/ /zab mo'i rgyud rnams tshig tu song/ /tha snyad mang la nyams len med/ /de dus phan phyir gter du sbas/ /gzhan na ma mchis rgyal ba'i bka'/ /las 'phro can dang phrad par shog/ gter srung rnams kyis thub par srungs/ /sa ma ya/ rgya rgya rgya/ rin chen gling pas gter nas gdan drangs shog ser la/ /zhal shus bka' shog dag la bris pa'i dge ba yis/ /'di 'dzin rigs ldan rnams dang 'gro ba ma lus kun/ /gsang sngags snying po'i don rtogs sangs rgyas myur thog shog/ /ghu hye/ sa ma ya/ rgya rgya rgya/ e ma ho /o rgyan thugs sras rin chen gling pa yis/ /zab mo'i gter nas rgyud chen gdan drangs te/ /snyigs dus 'gro ba thugs rjes nyer dgongs nas/ /chos kyi bka' bkrol dar zhing rgyas par mdzad/ /gter slob kun gyis ba' 'drin rjed par 'phangs/ /da lta'i dus na las 'phro snyom las can/ /tshe 'dir thar pa'i byang chub 'dod gyur kyang/ /le lo'i dbang ngam bsod nams dman pa yis/ /nyams len ma grub o rgyan thugs rjes bskul/ /dge ba dri med bco lnga'i zla 'dra des/ /pha mas gtso byas 'gro ba nyam thag rnams/ /thar lam chen po snying po'i don rtogs nas/ /bde ldan zhing du mtha' yas zhabs drung du/ /dkar smug 'dab ma stong ldan ze 'bru la/ /longs spyod rdzogs sku mtshan dpe ldan pa yis/ /byang chub sems kyi sprul pa 'gyed par shog

de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi snying po de kho na nyid nges pa/ ye shes mchog gi rgyud chen po/ gsang ba yongs rdzogs zhes bya ba rdzogs sho// //o ∂hyan (= o rgyan) gyi paˆ∂i ta chen po padma 'byung gnas kyis/ o ∂hyan dang/ rgya gar dbus kyi skad las/ rdo rje gdan du rang 'gyur mdzad/ /de nas bod yul lha sa 'phrul snang gi gtsug lag khang du/ mnga' bdag rje blon gsum la don rgyud gnang nas/ tshig brgyud don gyi dpe'i yi ge phyi mo/ dha ki'i gnas nas blangs te bris nas/ phyi rab don du gtsug lag khang de nyid du gter su sbas so/ /skal ldan las can cig dang phrad par shog/ / [xxx]/ sa ma ya/ rgya rgya rgya/ /e ma chos dbyings nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor nas/ /rgyud sde skar tshogs rnams kyi mchog /snying po nyi zla lta bu 'di/ /bdag 'dra padma 'byung gnas kyis/ /phyi rabs dus kyi lnga brgya la/ /mtshan nyid sde chos sngags sde dar dus su/ /tshig la dred cing don la rmongs pa yi/ /dar la ma smin grong bsnyen byed dus su/ /phan par bya phyir rgyal bas lung bstan nas/ /dha ki'i lag nas dpe blangs gter du sbas/ /don gyi shes rab blo ldan snying rje can/ /chos sam rad na'i ming can las ldan dang/ /rgyal ba'i dgongs pa de nyid 'phrad par shog/ /dpe snying mi la ma bstan gter du sbos/ /dam can tshogs kyis bka' 'di thub par srungs/ gtad rgya/ [∂xxx]/ gter rgya/ [∂xxx]/ sbas rgya/ shahye/ thad/ gsang rgya/ [∂xxx]/ dbang rgya/ [xxx]/ kha tha◊// [∂xxx]/ /e ma bdag 'dra rin chen gling pa yis/ /rgyal ba'i dgongs pa bla na med/ /rgyud sde'i mthar thug snying po'i don/ /o ∂hyan lung bstan gter nas bton/ /ma yig shog ser dngos la bshus/ /sems can don du dgongs pa la/ /gzhan gyis rang 'dod ma yin pas/ /bla ma dha ki'i tshogs rnams kyis/ /bka' chad ma mdzad byin gyis rlobs/ /'di nyid nyams len rigs 'dzin gyis/ /gtso byas mkha' mnyan 'gro ba kun/ /mkhyen gnyis yon tan myur thog shog /sa ma ya/ pa thå/ rgya rgya rgya/ ghuhya/ shog ser tsha'o/ /bdag 'dra nam mkha' lha dbang gi legs par bris/ /rdo rje mi 'gyur nam mkha'i rtsal zhes pas/ /o ∂hyan thugs gter zab chos 'di dag rnams/ spro ba chen po'i rtsol bas bzhengs pa lags/ /dge bas 'gro drug pha mar gyur pa rnams/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i go 'phang thob par shog/ /zhus dag

theg pa kun gyi snying khu 'di/ /rin chen zhu ba'i khu bas bris/ /mgul du btags pa phyi nang grol/ /skal ldan bu la rims kyis gtod/ /sa ma ya/ rgya rgya rgya/ sku gsung thugs kyi rgya dam pa yod do

228a-229b rigs 'dzin gyi 'das rjes

575 Ggi014.021 MWxxxpha14Ixxx1
229b-230b zhal chems dgongs nyams drug pa

576 Ggi014.022 MWxxxpha14Ixxx1
230b-231a gzhag thabs bzhi pa

577 Ggi014.023 MWxxxpha14Ixxx1
231a-231b gzer bu bdun gyis dgongs pa
gzer bu bdun gyis dgongs pa 'di/ /bee ro'i lag tu bab pa yi/ /skal ldan las can cig dang 'phrad par shog/ gza' bdud kyi rgyal pos srungs cig /gter rgya/ sbas rgya/ zab rgya
578 Ggi014.024 MWxxxpha14Ixxx1
231b-232a u rgyan dgongs pa'i zhal chems
sho lo ka ni bzhi pa 'di/ /u rgyan dgongs pa'i zhal chems so/ /rtags kyi rtags kyis ngo bo 'phrod/ /sgom gyis sgom gyis don khrol lo/ /gza' bdud kyi rgyal pos srungs la/ skal ldan bu la rim gyis gtod/ /gter rgya/ sbas rgya/ zab rgya
579 Ggi014.025 MWxxxpha14Ixxx1
232a-233a rigs 'dzin rnams kyi zhal chems
e ma ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos/ /yang tig srog gi bcud thig rnams/ /gcig tu dril te yi ger btab/ /ma 'ongs don du gter su stam/ /phyi mdud pa shes rab can/ /'jam dpal ci nas phyag rdor gyis/ /sprul pa 'byung gis 'phrad par shog/ /rdo rje legs pas bka' 'di srungs / sa ma ya/ rgya rgya rgya/ i ti/ bla na med pa bstan pa'i snying / mkha' 'gro'i srog/ skal ldan gyi nor/ don gyi mchog/ klong chen srog gi thig bya ba rdzogs so/ rgya rgya rgya/ kha tham/ ∂a bee ro tsa nas sprel lo sprel zla'i tshes bcu'i snga dro 'ching phu'i yang dben du/ chu shog rin chen zer 'phro la bris/ /rgyal sras sprul sku'i drung du gsol
580 Ggi014.026 MWxxxpha14Ixxx1
233a-245a bla ma sku gsum bde ba chen po'i gsang rgyud
sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa mthar thug gcig tu dril ba/ bla ma sku gsum bde ba chen po'i gsang rgyud ces bya ba / u rgyan padma 'byung gnas kyis/ u rgyas gyi skad las bod kyi yi ge ru/ /chos dbyings nam mkha'i rdzong du rang 'gyur mdzad pa'o// rdzogs sho// //e ma bdag 'dra padma 'byung gnas la/ gsang sngags mchog gi bka' babs kyang/ /bla ma'i thugs rgyud gsang ba 'di/ /de snga 'jig rten khams ma byung/ / pho brang bde ba chen po ru/ /'phags pa bsgrubs pa'i byin rlabs kyis/ /thugs rje chen pos rgyud 'di gnang/ /'di la brten nas 'gro la phan don du/ /bla ma'i sgrub thabs mang du brtsams/ /gter ka du mar sbas nas bdog/ /rgyud mchog gsang ba snying thig 'di/ /bdag nyid padma'i thugs la bcangs/ /srin po'i yul du bzhud kha ru/ /snyigs ma'i 'gro ba drang don du/ /yang gsang dgongs gter snying po ru/ /spel bar 'phangs nas gter du sbas/ /thub par srungs cig gter srungs tshogs/ /snying la phur cig sa ma ya/ rgya rgya rgya/ e ma/ bskal pa mar 'grib nye ba la/ /gter 'di dbang ba'i las can ni/ /u rgyan gnyis med thugs kyi sras/ /skye ba lnga yi tha ma la/ /mon bod gnyis kyi so mtshams su/ /me nyag ban chung shes rab can/ /sbas pa'i ngang nas skal ldan skyong/ /'khor ni khra mo rigs 'dus 'du/ /spyod lam ma nges kun gyi tshul/ /skye mtha' byang chub sems dpa' 'di/ /de la 'brel tshad u rgyal mjal/ /gang zhig de yi ming dang rus/ /bla rtags gsang ba'i mtshan thos kyang/ /byang chub mngon du bya pa yin/ /gang zhig bstod smad log lta spangs/ /nam zhig 'khor ba'i mtha' las grol/ skal ldan slob bu bcu dgu 'byung/ /de la chos 'di rdzogs par byin/ /'gro ba mang po smin par 'gyur/ / kun gyi tsitta'i dkyil du bcang/ /'khor ba rgyun gcod sku gsum thob/ /bdud kyi byin rlabs skur 'debs mkhan/ /u rgyan nga la rgyab kyis phyogs/ /dmyal ba bsgrub la sbyin mi bya/ /byin yang skal ldan sreg par 'gyur/ /seng ge dkar mo'i 'o ma de/ /rin chen gser snod ma gtogs pa/ /rdza shing snod du blug na 'gas/ /de phyir log lta can la gsang/ /byin na gsang ba'i dam tshig nyams/ /rdo rje dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur/ /de bas ma spel tsittar stim/ /shin tu zab pa'i rgyud mchog 'di/ /rad na gling zhes grags pa yi/ /skal ldan de dang 'phrad par shog / sa ma ya/ rgya rgya rgya/ sa ma ya/ [kha thaμ rgya rgya rgya rgya rgya]/ gter rgya/ sbas rgya/ gsang rgya
201 Ggi014.027 MWxxxpha14Ixxx1

las gang la 'ang tsha thur gyi 'khor lo dang / bcud dang gags tsha khyab pa gces / klu'i sdom rgya nag po / kha tha ma/ //slob dpon klu'i nyes pas rgya nag por bsgyur ba yin / chos 'di rgya nag por dar ba yin / klu'i nye ba'i slob dpon lha'i bla bya ba la brgyud pa'i lugs ni mu stegs yin zer te / bka' log par brgyud pa yin par gsung so;
